thread.title: Krishna Shroff does it again, posts topless pics on Instagram!
thread.title_full: Krishna Shroff does it again, posts topless pics on Instagram!

title: Krishna Shroff does it again, posts topless pics on Instagram!
text:
Arjun Kapoor's 5 pouty selfies 
New Delhi: Krishna Shroff, the beloved sister of actor Tiger Shroff, has once again raised the temperature by sharing her topless picture on Instagram. 
The pictures, showcasing the sensual side of Krishna Shroff, are not vulgar but sassy for sure. And it is not the first time that she has posted such hot pictures. 
Last month, the lady became the talk of the town when her topless images went viral on the Internet. Though, she was bashed for falling in the lines of Poonam Pandey and using nudity to gain cheap publicity. 


But we guess Krishna Shroff is bold enough to not pay heed to what the world is speaking about her and instead embrace her body. 
She shared the pictures on photo-sharing website Instagram with the caption ‘Mood’, which speaks for her fearless attitude. 
Let's see how the world takes it.
